title: What does the guy say in the beginning?
selftext:
So my brother and I have kind of been obsessed with this video in the past couple of years: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGiKg502anI

The guy seems to be saying some kind of prayer at the beginning, then he addresses the crowd and they all shout something back. What exactly is he saying?
comments:
He says in Kannada: "Don't clap for me. Claps are only for politicians. To give me energy, whistle!"

Someone then whistles. And the crowd shouts "Say victory to mother India" in Hindi (it's a popular slogan to show enthusiasm here).

light_cleaned_title: What does the guy say in the beginning?
light_cleaned_selftext: So my brother and I have kind of been obsessed with this video in the past couple of years: The guy seems to be saying some kind of prayer at the beginning, then he addresses the crowd and they all shout something back. What exactly is he saying?
light_cleaned_comments: He says in Kannada: "Don't clap for me. Claps are only for politicians. To give me energy, whistle!" Someone then whistles. And the crowd shouts "Say victory to mother India" in Hindi (it's a popular slogan to show enthusiasm here). Yes! Thank you, sir.
